About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

Terms.meta_description: Read our terms and conditions carefully before using our services. Learn about our policies, rights, and responsibilities.
Terms.title: Terms and Conditions
Terms.description: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services
Terms.acceptance_content: By using our website or services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, please do not use our services.
Terms.use_content: We provide educational courses in animation and design. You may use these services for personal educational purposes only. Commercial use of content is prohibited without prior permission.
Terms.property_content: All content, including texts, images, videos, and courses, are our intellectual property or that of our partners. Copying, distribution, or publication without prior permission is prohibited.
Terms.privacy_content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. Please review our privacy policy to understand how we collect and use your information.
Terms.payment_content: All payments are processed through secure payment gateways. Refund Policy: Full refunds can be requested within 30 days of purchase if content has not been accessed.
Terms.liability_content: We are not liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from the use of our services. Your use of the services is at your own risk.
Terms.modification_content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. You will be notified of any material changes via email or through our website.
Terms.contact_content: If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us via email or the form on our website.

Installation.meta_description: Follow our step-by-step installation guide to set up your development environment for animation and design courses.
Installation.title: Installation Guide
Installation.description: Follow these steps to set up your development environment and get started with our courses
Installation.step_1_content: Before installing any software, ensure your system meets the minimum requirements. You'll need at least 8GB RAM, 4GB free disk space, and a modern web browser.
Installation.step_2_content: Download the latest versions of Adobe Creative Suite, Blender, and other essential tools. We recommend using the official websites to ensure you get legitimate copies.
Installation.step_3_content: Install Photoshop, Illustrator, and After Effects from Adobe Creative Suite. Follow the installation wizard and ensure you have a valid Adobe account for activation.
Installation.step_4_content: Download and install Blender from the official website. Blender is free and open-source, making it perfect for learning 3D animation and modeling.
Installation.step_5_content: Set up your workspace with proper folder structures, project templates, and asset libraries. This will help you stay organized throughout your learning journey.
Installation.step_6_content: Install recommended plugins and extensions for enhanced functionality. These tools will help you work more efficiently and access advanced features.
Installation.step_7_content: Test all installed software to ensure everything is working correctly. Create a simple test project to verify that all tools are properly configured.
Installation.step_8_content: You're all set! Start with our beginner courses and gradually progress to more advanced topics. Remember to save your work regularly and backup your projects.
